mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods ( goodsno, adminno, itemno, gname, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point, origin, exdate, storage, grams) VALUES(goods_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{itemno}, #{gname}, #{content}, #{cnt}, #{word}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, #{price}, #{dc}, #{saleprice}, #{salecnt}, #{point}, #{origin}, #{exdate}, #{storage}, #{grams})
mapper.select: SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, gname, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods ORDER BY goodsno ASC
SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, gname, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods WHERE itemno = #{itemno} ORDER BY goodsno DESC

SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, gname, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point, origin, exdate, storage, grams FROM goods WHERE goodsno = #{goodsno}

SELECT goodsno, adminno, itemno, gname, content, cnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, salecnt, point FROM goods
WHERE itemno=#{itemno}
WHERE itemno=#{itemno} AND (UPPER(gname) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY goodsno DESC
